name: conduit
description: Conduit is a simple data pipeline tool for loading and transforming csv files

scripts.start: concurrently     "cd server && python -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload"     "cd client && npm start"     "dagster dev -m server.app.dagster.repo -p 3500 -d ."
